Oral solution
Cautionary and advisory labels

Label 9 - Space the doses evenly throughout the day. Keep taking this medicine until the course is finished, unless you are told to stop

Oseltamivir 15mg/ml oral solution sugar free <ph outputclass="manufacturer">(A A H Pharmaceuticals Ltd)</ph> 18373811000001100

  • 20 ml POM

    NHS indicative price = £10.00
